channel.title: Throne of Lies on Jingle Jam 2019!
channel.description:
https://www.humblebundle.com/yogscast/yogscast-jingle-jam-2019
Check out this charitable bundle, containing TONS of games (including *Throne*) for an awesome price. 100% to charity!
We've received a jump in player numbers, lately, due to this - be sure to *guide* new players well so they stick around to keep those queue times low :slight_smile:
--Xblade @ https://discord.gg/tol
